Potent Challenge

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite: Con 15, fighter, Combat Challenge class feature
Benefit: If you hit a foe with an attack granted by your Combat Challenge class feature, add your Constitution modifier to the damage roll.
Special: This benefit applies only to attacks made with two-handed weapons.


Revision (7/28/2008)
Replace "opportunity attack" with "attack granted by Combat Challenge" in Chart description.

Published in Player's Handbook, page(s) 199.
